summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMurad's Retinol Youth Renewal Serum is a potent yet gentle retinol that improves the look of wrinkles around eyes (including lids!) with 360 application.
details: DetailsBenefits#1 Retinol eye serum in the U.S.*Restorative retinol for under-eyes and lidsHelps minimize the signs of agingDramatically improves the look of lines, wrinkles, and loss of firmnessDelivers 24 hours of hydration and instantly brightensCreated for all ages and all skin types, including sensitiveOphthalmologist testedAlways tested on people, never on animals*Source: The NPD Group, Inc. / U.S. Prestige Beauty Total Measured Market, Retinol Named Skincare Eye Treatment Product Layer Sales, 12 months ending September 2020Formulated WithoutParabens, sulfates, and phthalatesResearch Results93% saw a reduction in lines and wrinkles, smoother and softer eye area skin*87% noticed firmer eye area skin*90% saw more youthful, revitalized eye area skin**In just 4 weeksItem 2556345How To UseUse AM and PM:Cleanse face, neck and chest. Gently pat around the eye area, including eye lid.Follow with a serum and moisturizer, and SPF during the day.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Meadowfoam Delta-Lactone, Retinyl Propionate, Retinol, Swertia Chirata Leaf Extract, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Isopropyl Palmitate, Lecithin, PVP, Hexylene Glycol, Capryl Glycol, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PVM/MA Decadiene Crosspolymer, PEG-8, Carbomer, Sodium Bisulfite, Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Red 4 (CI 14700), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use AM and PM:Cleanse face, neck and chest. Gently pat around the eye area, including eye lid.Follow with a serum and moisturizer, and SPF during the day.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes.

reviews.headline: Too strong for my delicate eye area
reviews.comments: This eye cream was too strong for me.  It causes a rash and itching.  So I had to replace it with another brand.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: This serum goes on so much easier than a cream. It glides on easily under eyes and on lids without irritation or feeling greasy. And a little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: works well
reviews.comments: it lifts my hooded eyelids

reviews.headline: Crow lines are almost gone
reviews.comments: I turned 50 and like over night my bag and wrinkles around my eyes where super stong. Got this on a sale to try. Glad I got the full size, because I have now used it for three months. My bags have actually become light and the wrinkles dont show as much. Even my sister comment on them. The pump isn't messy and easy to use. And the texture and smell are very light and refreshing.

reviews.headline: Good.
reviews.comments: I got this eye serum when it was 50% off. It's easy to apply and not oily not greasy. I like it.

reviews.headline: Super disappointed
reviews.comments: I was really excited about this product, but unfortunately, after using it twice per day for the past 3 weeks, my under eyes actually look worse. My under eye area looks pretty bad when wearing makeup since starting this serum. I'm 45, but have minimal fine lines under my eyes. This, somehow, seems to intensify the ones that I have though. Thankfully, it doesn't burn my eyes or cause any kind of skin irritation.

reviews.headline: Doesn't really work
reviews.comments: Made my wrinkles worse

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I got it while it's on sale to try.  I don't have sensitive skin, but this eye serum irritated my skin is much. Right after I put it on, I have to is tingling burning sensation. It did go away after a while but I didn't think it was good so I wiped it off. Best to get a sample to try before you commit to a full sized

reviews.headline: Love it!!!
reviews.comments: I love love love this brand. It's the best I've tried thus far

reviews.headline: Not for any kind of sensitive skin
reviews.comments: …or even if you think you have sensitive skin! I don't normally, but I had a bad allergic reaction.

reviews.headline: Best eye serum
reviews.comments: This is by far the best eye serum I've ever used.  I got it when it was on sale.  I will definitely buy again.  I've been using for a couple of weeks now and around my eyes is much brighter and wrinkles less noticeable.  Amazing product.

reviews.headline: I like this cream
reviews.comments: Just recently purchased this cream and I'm liking it so far. Can't tell about any significant changes yet but it's hydrating around my eye areas and doing great with my sensitive skin. Hope it'll minimize my wrinkles and plump my skin. Will update later more after using it longer.

reviews.headline: Very effective
reviews.comments: ￼ I was skeptical at first, but I still gave it a try. I used it for three weeks, and I saw very good results. My bags and crows feet are gone! ￼ This product is magical. ￼ It's very worth it.

reviews.headline: Great eye cream!!
reviews.comments: Love it but it is too expensive. Lower the price so people can try it to see how great it is, everyone deserves to try this.

reviews.headline: yes I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: I have used this product for several years and I think it really works for lines around my eyes.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: After just two weeks , I see an improvement in skin tone around my eyes!  Less lines!

reviews.headline: Love the results
reviews.comments: I received this complimentary from Murad for review. My main skincare concern is anti-aging, especially in my under eye area. This formula is very lightweight and absorbs fast without feeling heavy, and it doesn't pill under make up. my skin feels more hydrated and look smooth, or after use. I like the mess-free applicator pump that deposits the perfect amount.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Absolutely IN LOVE with this eye serum ! It leaves my eye bags to be nonexistent and feeling so refreshed.  It feels and applies so smoothly on my face and i look forward to using it every day.  Recommend highly

faceoff_positive.comments:
Murad Skincare - Retinol & Resurgence Review
As I approach 30, I've gotten much better about an anti-aging nighttime skincare routine. This line from Murad is a good option to start entering the world of retinol. For best results, we are meant to use in combination with Retinol Youth Renewal Serum and Retinol Youth Renewal Eye Serum. This super-trio is buffered by gentle hydrating ingredients that make sure you don't get the flake or irritation that's known to come with retinol. 
The serum for eyes specifically is designed to "treat fine lines and wrinkles, firm skin and reduce dark circles for an overall vibrant morning face."
Overall: High end, quality retinol product, very popular and admired brand. It's a nice option for a simple 3-step nighttime care kit. Light and easy to layer together, not greasy. It does get tingly on the eyes so be careful and don't over apply. 
Packaging: it is great to have the pump on the jar. The pump dispenser means you will be able to get the dose out accurately; one pump is enough for both eyes. It's also great & necessary that the container keeping the product away from light and air. 
Ingredients: Overall this does not have the cleanest ingredients, very strong chemicals in here. Very potent, but not the most gentle option on the market for sensitive skin. The retinol is a newer formula, not the barebones formulas that are known for irritation. Although I still had a noticeable, flakey dry spot under my eyebrow. This is known to happen with retinol. I probably didn't apply the moisturizing step and this caused the flaking. 
Fragrance ingredients aren't the best for sensitive skins. Small amounts of very volatile, synthetic environmentally toxic ingredients. Shea & other ingredients are there for antioxidants and to help moisturize. Peptide-rich red algae extract helps improve firmness and elasticity.
Cruelty free! 
Results: I have been using for about 5 weeks. I haven't seen dramatic results yet, but ingredients list leads me to be confident that I will around week 12. This product line is known to take 12 weeks or more to really see effect set in. Which is expected as retinol, essentially gentler formulas, are known to take this long to see results.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great eye cream!

faceoff_negative.comments: I received the Retinol Youth Renewal Eye Serum in the trial kit and was really looking forward to seeing results.  After using this product for about 2 weeks, I developed white spots - almost like small pimples - around my eyes - and of course on the most delicate areas!  Not only that, it actually looked as if I developed MORE fine lines and the skin around my eye area was very dry.  I will stick to my Regenerist Retinol24 Night Eye Cream.....
faceoff_negative.headline: Soooo wanted this to work!
